name: The turkey goes gobble, gobble, gobble!
description: A decoration made of turkey feathers will have a gradual color when heated, giving off dazzling brilliance.
effect: All Atributes +1,Dmg dealt to plant monsters +3%

name: The Winter
description: Use this item to unlock a new adventurer's hair.

name: The Year of Pig Blessing Card
description: Big ears, eyes like black soya beans, short tail and a chubby face. Oink, oink~ What a bliss it is to be surrounded by a flock of cute little piggy is the year of the Pig!

name: The Year of Pig blessing Giftbox
description: Oink oink~ Happy year of the pig! The Year of Pig brings good fortune~

name: The Year of Pig Redpack
description: Wish you prosperity! Red packet for me!

name: Thick Dagger
description: Knives made by a special alchemy method passed down by a tribe in the desert.

name: Thick Dagger [2]
description: Knives made by a special alchemy method passed down by a tribe in the desert.

name: Thick Lips
description: The mouth make-up prop used by folklorists in order to be part of the Dokebi.

name: Thick Lips Blueprint
description: The mouth make-up prop used by folklorists in order to be part of the Dokebi.

name: Thief Clothes
description: Unlike ordinary thieves, the thieves in this outfit focused on the treasure and helped the poor.
effect: M.Def ＋20,[Thief Clothes VIII] ＋ [Holy Dagger VIII]: ＋15% damage against S-sized targets, ＋5% to M-sized targets and ＋10% to L-sized targets

name: Thief Clothes [1]
description: Unlike ordinary thieves, the thieves in this outfit focused on the treasure and helped the poor.
effect: M.Def ＋20,[Thief Clothes VIII] ＋ [Holy Dagger VIII]: ＋15% damage against S-sized targets, ＋5% to M-sized targets and ＋10% to L-sized targets

name: Thor's Steel Gloves
description: The steel gloves worn by Thor when the hammer was thrown. Although solid and practical, they can't be equipped.

name: Thorn Seed
description: It will grow rapidly when coming into contact with soil. It boasts superior survivability but seems to fear fire.

name: Thorny Buckler [1]
description: A stinging shield that looks a bit heavy. It stabs enemies who initiate attack.
